channel.title: Complexity on ShootBird

item.title: How to ask questions about an AI/ML claim
item.description: AI is not magic. Movies have overwrought this idea that we’re making tiny microprocessor equivalents of the human brain that can talk, think, and act like us. But the reality is quite different. Here, I’ll cover how to question an AI/ML claim, because the hardest part about asking questions about a subject is knowing where to start. Hopefully, this would provide you with better tooling with which to think about AI/ML and move past outdated movie tropes.
